General.Name: Ora Banda Mining Ltd
General.Description: Ora Banda Mining Limited engages in the exploration, operation, and development of mineral properties in Australia. The company explores for gold, nickel, copper, lithium, and base metal deposits. It holds 100 % interest in the Davyhurst Gold project comprises 92 tenements covering an area of approximately 1,210 square kilometers located in North-West of Kalgoorlie, Western Australia. Its production deposits also include the Riverina, Sand King, Missouri, Waihi, Callion, Lady Ida, Mulline, and Golden Eagle projects. The company was formerly known as Eastern Goldfields Limited and changed its name to Ora Banda Mining Limited in June 2019. Ora Banda Mining Limited was incorporated in 2002 and is based in Subiaco, Australia.
General.Address: 2 Kings Park Road, West Perth, WA, Australia, 6005
